summary: A very simple mod that makes Ulfric\'s Gag (seen in the prologue) a playable item.
descriptionHtml:
[color=orange]While I wholeheartedly endorse valve I do not endorse the upload of my mods to SteamWorkshop, please respect this decision.[/color]
A very simple mod that makes Ulfric\'s Gag (seen in the prologue) a playable item.

To acquire simply use console (~) and type:
 [i]player.additem 000F9670 1[/i]


[b]Roll-playing ideas:[/b] I thought this would make an interesting item for playing a monk/mage character. Or maybe a greybeard who was born mute who has learnt to summon the power of the Thu\'um telepathically. Or anyone who\'s a real silent type - I\'m looking at you Strider.
author: Hoax2
